## Completion Checklist
Once you start, track your progress here:

- [ ] Translated all template files
- [ ] Translated navigation elements
- [ ] Translated footer
- [ ] Translated privacy policy

- [ ] Tested all pages render correctly
- [ ] Reviewed for cultural appropriateness
- [ ] Ready for pull request
